examples.example: 这种现象在日常生活中是很常见的。

translate.english: This kind of phenomenon is very common in daily life.

examples.example: 在公园里，常见人们悠闲地散步、锻炼和享受美好时光。

translate.english: In the park, it is common to see people taking a leisurely walk, exercising and enjoying the good time.

examples.example: 在动物园里，常见各种可爱的动物欢快地玩耍。

translate.english: In the zoo, various kinds of cute animals are commonly seen playing merrily.
